snippet: A Canadian court found the former executives of the failed Nortel Networks not guilty in a complex and protracted fraud case.
abstract: Canadian court acquits former executives of failed Nortel Networks--Frank A Dunn, Douglas C Beatty and Michael J Gollogly--in a complex and protracted fraud case.
lead_paragraph: A Canadian court found the former executives of the failed Nortel Networks not guilty in a complex and protracted fraud case.

headline.seo: 3 Former Top Nortel Executives Are Acquitted of Fraud
headline.main: 3 Former Top Nortel Executives Are Acquitted of Fraud Involving Bonuses
headline.print_headline: 3 Former Top Nortel Executives Are Acquitted of Fraud Involving Bonuses
